resources.string:
"Spark Resume is a free and easy to use website tool to create professional Curriculum Vitae (CV) or Resume for the Company Interviews.These resumes can also be uploaded on Online Portals such as LinkedIn, Naukri,com etc.

"
"Spark Resume uses minimalistic templates created by our very own Design team to create Resumes that follow strictly according to the Industry Norms and Regulations.

"
"We offer you a number of Catergories to select from according to your field of work and Skill Set. The resume designs vary with formats and designs respectively.

"
"At the end, all the data provided by the user is compiled into a presentable form and as is given to the user in the form of .pdf. The file can be readily printed for the Walk-in Interviews or can be uploaded on Online Portals.

"
"Special Note: This model is absolutely free and there are no hidden charges. Even the data provided by user is dropped immediately after analysis for personal delevopment of the website and are not sent to any 3rd party for revenue generation.NO WATERMARK WILL BE ADDED TO YOUR RESUME for our own promotions.

"
"Feel free to use our Creation!
" "Thank You."

Hi,\nWe are a small independent team of students which work with love on TteKobra, this is our first app, so we have a lot to learn by your feebdack. If you enjoy our work you can show us your appreciation by donating.\nWith your help we can make this project even better or start new cool ones.

Congratulation, Your Resume has successfully been sent to your email address.
It might take 1 to 10 minutes to reach your inbox.

"Did you like our work?
If yes, you can buy us coffee by clicking the DONATE button. Else you can continue by pressing Send Mail button.
 Thank you for using our free service"
